subject: feat: add role-specific interpretation guidance to sections
body:
Instead of hiding sections from certain roles, show contextual guidance
that helps Executive/Management users interpret detailed data:

- Developer Patterns: "high weekend % may signal burnout risk"
- Who Does What: "balanced distribution indicates healthy knowledge sharing"
- Urgency by Contributor: "high urgency indicates process gaps"
- Activity Heatmap: "significant off-hours work may indicate staffing issues"
- etc.

Developers see raw data without hints (they understand it).
Guidance updates automatically when view level changes.
title: add role-specific interpretation guidance to sections
